titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

change.ab: Transcribed cards. s1: "1m 1v" = "D"? "O"? part of abbreviation s2: Nov 7 = "Dec"? but appears next to payment info s3: March 23 = no idea
